title: RA Sushi serves traditional Japanese items
statement: RA Sushi serves traditional Japanese dishes including edamame, miso soup, sashimi, and nigiri.

citations.quote: EDAMAME Steamed soybeans dusted with salt... MISO SOUP Tofu, seaweed and green onions in a miso broth... SASHIMI ASSORTMENT... NIGIRI ASSORTMENT
